192.168.6.36/29

/29 255.255.255.248=> 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111000

11111111.11111111.11111111.11111 000

Network address = 11000000.10101000.00000110.00100000 =>192.168.6.32

no. of subnet bits = 29-(24 class c)=5 bits

number of subnets = 2^5= 32

no. of host bits remaining=8(default)-5 (subnet bits)=3

number of host available for each subnet= 2^3 -2= 8-2=6
